law.catch_line: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated....

section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Department" means the Department of Legislative Services.
"Prefile" means to direct the Department, before a regular session of the General Assembly, to file a bill for introduction during that session.

text.section: A member or member-elect of the General Assembly may prefile a bill, as provided in this section.

section.section:
In any other year, a member may prefile a bill at any regular session by:
on or before the preceding November 15, requesting the Department to prepare the bill; and
on or before the second Friday following Thanksgiving, directing the Department, in writing, to file the bill for introduction.

text.section: A directive to file a bill for introduction shall be in writing and shall state the name of each sponsor of the bill.

section.section: On the first day of each regular session, the Department shall send to the Secretary of the Senate and the Chief Clerk of the House, as appropriate, copies of each bill, in the form that the Senate rules set for introduction in the Senate or that the House rules set for introduction in the House.
Each bill that is sent under this subsection shall be considered as filed for introduction.
